item.title: Introducing Buster
item.description: Buster is a Super simple, Totally awesome, Brute force static site generator for Ghost inspired by Octopress. Generate Static Pages. Preview. Deploy to Github Pages. The interface setup [--gh-repo=<repo-url>]       Creates a GIT repository inside static/ directory. If you don’t specify the repo-url, buster will ask you the clone URL of your new Github Pages repository. generate [--domain=<local-address>]       Generates static pages from locally running Ghost instance. preview       Preview what’s generated on localhost:9000.
